mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_news where title like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
mapper.sql: id, newstype_id, title, tpic_url, newsabstract, user_id, reading, status, createtime, cpic_url, stick, audit

'false' as QUERYID,
,

mapper.insert:
insert into t_news
newstype_id,
title,
tpic_url,
newsabstract,
user_id,
reading,
status,
createtime,
cpic_url,
stick,
audit,
content,

mapper.update:
update t_news
newstype_id = #{newstype_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tpic_url = #{tpic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newsabstract = #{newsabstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
reading = #{reading,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpic_url = #{cpic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stick = #{stick,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit = #{audit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_news set newstype_id = #{newstype_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tpic_url = #{tpic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newsabstract = #{newsabstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, reading = #{reading,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpic_url = #{cpic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stick = #{stick,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit = #{audit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
